name: data
short_description:
Quite a few changes were made in this feature . Civicrm already had caching 

technique implemented, this technique is extended to remember the selected 

contacts while traversing [url=http://www.discspringsource.com]disc spring[/url] 

across pages as well as fetching the selected contacts while performing action 

task. The caching functionality which is the heart of this feature was extended 

and used. Existing prevnext_cache table and the newly introduced is_selected 

column are used to maintain selection during pagination(alphabetic as well as 

numeric).Everytime contacts are selected,
